verbs.description: [V: According] to a letter , the June 12 meeting was canceled in a letter from Trump to Kim .
According to a letter , the June 12 meeting [V: was] canceled in a letter from Trump to Kim .
[ARGM-ADV: According] to a letter , [ARG1: the June 12 meeting] was [V: canceled] [ARGM-LOC: in a letter from Trump to Kim] .
